full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA MO TSE RING MCHED LNGA GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB CHO GA DANG 'BREL BA'I DUS MCHOD BYA TSUL PHYVA GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED DON YOD LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008B (CES PA'I PAR BYA'O, ,YIG BRGYA BZOD GSOL 'DOD DON GSOL BA GANG RIGS KYI MTHAR, BUM PA'I NANG GI LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA 'OD DU ZHU NAS BDUD RTZI'I RANG BZHIN DU GYUR BAR BSAM LA, ,NAD KYI BTAB PA'I PHYUGS NAD LA KHRUS BYAS SHING PHYUGS GZHAN LA'ANG GTOR PAR BYA'O, ,BSNGO SMON BRJOD CING RIGS KYIS BRGYAN PAR BYA'O, ,ZHES LHA MO GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I SGRUB CHO GA DANG 'BREL BA'I RUS MCHOD BYA TSUL PHYUGS GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED DON YOD @009A *, ,LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SGRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG DANG, BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS DBANG POS MDZAD PA'I GTAD DKAR 'GRO BZANG MA'I GTOR CHOG SOGS LA GZHI BYAS TE, GO SLA ZHING 'KHYER BDE BAR BLO LHUN MING CAN GYIS BGYIS PA YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG 'BYUNG GNAS SO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,)
